args.title: Financial Education and Fraud Prevention
args.body:
Here are the latest statistics on financial fraud, successful cases of fraud prevention through financial education, and key content from financial education courses on fraud prevention. Based on these, here are some recommendations to prevent financial fraud:

1. Stay informed about common fraud schemes.
2. Verify the legitimacy of financial institutions and advisors.
3. Use strong, unique passwords for all financial accounts.
4. Regularly monitor your financial statements for any unauthorized transactions.
5. Educate yourself and your family about financial literacy.

origin_prompt.content: 我需要了解金融教育对预防金融诈骗的作用。首先，请获取关于金融诈骗的最新统计数据。然后，获取一些通过金融教育成功预防诈骗的案例。接着，获取一些金融教育课程中关于诈骗预防的内容。最后，基于这些信息，为我提供一些预防金融诈骗的建议。
